ValidationRule.description: BIZ-45074 Value of Status Justification cannot be blank if value of Status picklist is Inactive or Verification Declined
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Inactive"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Verification Declined") ), ISBLANK(Status_Justification__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter ‘Status Justification’ when inactivating/ declining verification request for the account.
